abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Glamsquad chief executive Alexandra Wilkis Wilson, who discusses her career and management technique.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Glamsquad explains how the piano taught her to handle mistakes. With video.

headline.main: Alexandra Wilkis Wilson on the Art of Recovering From a Wrong Note
headline.print_headline: The Right Way to Hit a Wrong Note

snippet: The chief executive of Glamsquad explains how the piano taught her to handle mistakes. With video.
